vulnerability_description: If an Tomcat instance is deployed on the target URL, when we send a request for a non existent resource we receive a Tomcat error page with version.
vulnerability_remediation: you should not let the user see the raw HTTP 404 error page rendered by the server. Instead, you should design your own user-friendly 404 error page
impact: A remote user can exploit this vulnerability to trigger information disclosure on the targeted system.
